title: Multicultural Competency Development Math Project Based on Virtual Partnerships

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematics Knowledge and Experience with Online Collaboration Tools
context.additional_context: Real-time video classes and asynchronous collaborative activities conducted in a smartphone-centric environment.

learning_goals: Enhance multicultural understanding by solving math problems with virtual collaboration tools alongside peers from diverse cultural backgrounds
Visualize and interpret cultural data collected through online partnerships using mathematical analysis (graphs/statistics)
Apply communication strategies considering cultural differences in a 4-week virtual team project, achieving over 80% collaboration efficiency

resources: Mobile-compatible collaboration tools (Google Docs, Slack, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
